Introduction
After a long time I am back with a new handy tool called Skypr.

What is this?
I am a frequent Skype user and I am getting really tired of those ads and flickering images. So I decided to dig into this Ã¢â‚¬ËœissueÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ and write something for it.

How does it work?
Well simply explained:
- Skypr will block system access to the advertisement server of Skype.
- Skypr will patch every Skype user config available.
- Skypr will lock every config, so Skype cannot overwrite it.

Are there any limitations?
No, everything works as normal. You still have a fully functional Skype, even premium users or subscribers. This tool will cause no issues.

What are the features?
Patch Skype within a few seconds.
Restore anytime you want.
Completely removes all ads, including the frames. So no white empty blocks.
Does not fuck up your hosts file, Skypr wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t even touch it!
Skypr is not harmful for your account, it only changes your local system.

What are the requirements?
This tool has been tested on Windows 8.1, but it should work on Windows Vista and higher, and of course Windows 10. This tool must be ran as Administrator.
